page.title: 08Marston, Children
page.content: 24 children aged 3-5 attend the nursery school which opened in 1975.Those aged 5-9 attend Shelton Lower School or Church End Lower School, whilst the 9-13 year olds go to Holywell Middle School,Cranfield or Stewartby Middle School.The playgroup for 20 children aged 3-5 years meets in the village hall for 3 mornings each week. The Scouts and Cubs have a membership of 9-30 respectively.Each year they attend a camp, this year they won a 5-a-side football tournament.The Guides and Brownies have a membership of 9 and 25 repectively.This year they attended a County Camp for the first time. Two youth Clubs operate in the parish.One run by the Methodist church has 40 members aged 8-12.The other has 70 members aged 11-16.
